casebody.data:
VHS DETROIT RECEIVING HOSPITAL, INC., doing business as Detroit Receiving Hospital and University Health Center, and VHS Harper-Hutzel Hospital, Inc., doing business as Harper-Hutzel Hospital, Plaintiffs-Appellants,
v.
CITY OF DETROIT, Defendant-Appellee. SC: 159875
COA: 341628 Supreme Court of Michigan. July 24, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendant-appellee to extend the time for filing its answer to the application for leave to appeal is GRANTED. The answer will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before August 22, 2019.
